description:
Project Overview:
Our Cash Application leverages AI Models to automate data extraction from documents. We are seeking a skilled Dev-Ops Engineer to develop and integrate these AI capabilities, manage model training pipelines, and ensure high accuracy and performance of the ML related infra components.

Responsibilities:

Set up and manage ML pipelines using AWS SageMaker/Containers and Step Functions.

Create and manage containerized environments for model training and deployment using AWS ECR.

Automate the model training process triggered by user-submitted templates.

Monitor and evaluate model performance, implementing improvements as needed.

Collaborate with backend and frontend developers to integrate ML models into the application.

Ensure models are deployed securely and comply with AWS GovCloud standards.

Manage versioning and rollback strategies for ML models.

Required Skills:

Proficient in Python and ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch).

Familiarity with AWS ML services (SageMaker, Step Functions, ECR).

Experience with containerization (Docker) and orchestration.

Ability to design and implement scalable ML pipelines.

Knowledge of version control and model management practices.

Preferred Qualifications:


Previous experience with AWS GovCloud or similar secure cloud environments.

AWS certifications related to machine learning (AWS Certified solution architect).

Experience with deploying ML models in production environments.

Familiarity with DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines for ML workflows.

How to Apply: Please provide your resume, portfolio of ML projects, and a brief description of your experience with, ML deployments particularly within AWS environments.
